name: Yesh Invoice Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: Yesh Invoice

sections.description:
Use Yesh Invoice plugin to help run your business and sell without a hassel:
• Easy to connect to.
• Use for clearing with credit companies.
• Use for payment installments.
• Through Meshulam you can accept payment via Bit and PayPal, it’s simple and quick.
• Perfect invoices that you can customize with your very own signature and logo.
• Invoices are signed digitally.

About Us

Yesh Invoice is a brilliant invoice platform that lets you issue invoices without a limit, has useful reports, great analytics, let’s you manage your expenses and add third party integrations.
With YeshInvoice you have access to all our great features at a fix price, no need to pay more. Thanks to YeshInvoice you can run your business online easily. We have worked hard to make it simple for you to manage your expenses and incomes. Why pay more will others when you can have it all with YeshInvoice?
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments Tab, and toggle “ON” the Yesh Invoice – Gateway payment method that the customer will see during checkout.
sections.faq:
What is Yesh Invoice?

Yesh Invoice is the best Digital Invoices for business. You can manager your customers, invoices, expenses management, reports, credit card, documents backup and more.

Which credit companies can I use to Credit Card clearing?

You can clear credit cards with Tranzila, CardCom, PeleCard, Meshulam, PayPal, YaadPay, Max Bussiness. All you have to do is connect to the plugin in Yesh Invoice Market place.

Do I need to have Yesh Invoice Account?

Yes, to use WooCommerce plugin you need first create an account at Yesh Invoice.

Can I refund a transaction?

Yes, refund a transaction should be done in Yesh Invoice App

Can I customize my invoice?

Yes, we have a lot templates and colors. You can choose and play with the colors.
To do so, go to your account in Yesh Invoice App.

Do I need a developer to install the plugin?

No, you can do it by yourself.
